includedAssets.title: I'll Remember
includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep1 - I'll Remember
includedAssets.synopsis: Elena struggles to cope with Damon's death as she returns to Whitmore College and seeks a way to move on with her life for good.

includedAssets.title: Season 6
includedAssets.synopsis: Mystic Falls will never be the same as Elena and Stefan try to move on with their lives in the wake of Damon's death. An Earth-shattering sixth season of the supernatural teen drama starring Nina Dobrev.
